channel.title: Blog on First-Gear.be
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on First-Gear.be

item.title: Introduction
item.description: This is the fist post on my new blog website. I’ll try to post some content more regularly than I used to do. Blogging is harde than you think. Fortunately I have already prepared some content for you to browse to. Check the Movies section of the website. In that section I have put all of the movies I have at my disposal.
